title: Principles of Programming Languages
description: Principles of definition of and reasoning about programming languages and domain-specific languages; use of semantics for interpretation and in program analyses for correctness, security and efficiency.
prerequisites: Prerequisite(s): COMPSCI 2C03 , and COMPSCI 2LC3  or 2DM3, and COMPSCI 2AC3  or 2FA3, and COMPSCI 2ME3
schedule: Three lectures; one tutorial (one hour); first term
courseText: COMPSCI 3MI3 - Principles of Programming Languages 3 unit(s)

Principles of definition of and reasoning about programming languages and domain-specific languages; use of semantics for interpretation and in program analyses for correctness, security and efficiency.
Three lectures; one tutorial (one hour); first term
Prerequisite(s): COMPSCI 2C03 , and COMPSCI 2LC3  or 2DM3, and COMPSCI 2AC3  or 2FA3, and COMPSCI 2ME3
